籤詩版本二:
Reciting poems at sunset and singing songs under the moon
Laughing at every opportunity
When we meet, we will hide in danger.
Sing together and sing Lian Liluo

Lianli refers to a continuous tree. It symbolizes harmony between husband and wife.
Luo Zhiwang. It means that a couple is entangled with each other. Or silk and satin refers to colorful clothes.
詩意: This hexagram is a sign of keeping things old and changing at any time. Everything is auspicious.
解曰: The beauty is in the house. Sing poetry. There was joy. Good luck and misfortune.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Xiaomei is in trouble
In the Song Dynasty, Su Xiaomei was the younger sister of Su Dongpo. She was erudite and talented. On their wedding night, Su Xiaomei recited poems and wrote couplets. Three difficult questions were prepared to test the husband-in-law, and he deliberately made things difficult for the groom Qin Shaoyou. When it came to the third question, Qin Shaoyou thought hard.
Fortunately, Su Dongpo secretly helped him before he could enter the bridal chamber.
There is a poem that says:
Articles have said since ancient times that the younger sister is smarter than her husband;
The bridegroom of Three Difficulties is really strange, a house of elegance that is unparalleled in the world.
聖意:
The house is safe.
Good luck to itself.
Seek good fortune.
Trading is profitable.
Marriage is completed.
Liujia Female.
Pedestrians arrive.
Field silkworms are ripe.


The six animals are prosperous.
Looking for someone to come.
The lawsuit is justified.
Migration is lucky.
Lost things are bad.
The disease is cured.
Good luck in the mountain tomb.
